comments.raw_text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #668002 +++

We should have set of unit tests that run as part of the test suite, that test each Softoken mechanism (hash, crypto, digest, etc.) with empty input.
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
